description: Proton Docs is a web-based document editor integrated into Proton Drive that allows users to create, edit, and collaborate on text documents with end-to-end encryption. Proton Drive is Proton's encrypted cloud storage service, designed to protect files and documents from unauthorized access while enabling private sharing and syncing across devices.

When you create a new document in Proton Drive using the built-in Proton Docs editor, the app saves it as a PROTONDOC file. If you open an existing text-based file, such as a .DOCX or .TXT , in Proton Docs, a new PROTONDOC version is generated for editing within the encrypted environment.
